news.title: Israel warns 'Tehran will burn' if Iran continues missile strikes
news.summary: Israel's defense minister warns Iran that "Tehran will burn" if it keeps firing missiles at Israeli civilians. Israel's Defense Minister: "Iranian regime will burn if it continues to fire missiles at Israel"

news.title: Bitcoin becoming 'more central’ to portfolios as its volatility cools, Coatue's Philippe Laffont says
news.summary: Coatue founder Philippe Laffont discusses not investing in bitcoin sooner. He says the shrinking cost of getting in and the crypto's evolving role in a portfolio.

news.title: Trump approves U.S. Steel merger with Japan’s Nippon after companies sign national security agreement
news.summary: U.S. Steel's merger with Japan's Nippon Steel was approved by President Donald Trump on Friday. The companies signed a national security agreement with the United States.

news.title: Oil jumps more than 7% on supply risk from Israel-Iran conflict
news.summary: Israel launched airstrikes against Iran without U.S. support. Crude futures jumped more than $5 a barrel on Friday after Israel launched airstrikes.

news.title: Air India crash: What to know about the first fatal Boeing Dreamliner tragedy
news.summary: An Air India jet flying from Ahmedabad to London crashed shortly after takeoff into a fireball with 242 people aboard. The crash killed all 242 people on board.

news.title: My friend, 83, wants to add me to his bank account to pay his bills. What could go wrong?
news.summary: “He has no close family. I don’t want to place myself in a position of liability,” she says.

news.title: Why we cheap out on Father’s Day
news.summary: Americans spend $10 billion more on Mother's Day than Father's Day. What’s going on? CNN.com takes a look.

news.title: 3 reasons that bitcoin in your 401(k) is still a terrible idea
news.summary: The Labor Department is considering changes to its hiring practices. What is the Labor Department thinking? What are they thinking? Share your thoughts with CNN iReport.

news.title: My mother-in-law thought the world’s richest man needed Apple gift cards. How on Earth could she fall for this scam?
news.summary: “Her siblings are all shocked that she would believe this,” her sister says. “Her parents are shocked, too. They’re all shocked.”

news.title: How Trump wants to use the U.S. tax code to crack down on undocumented immigrants
news.summary: Republicans’ massive tax-and-spending bill limits income and cuts off tax breaks for undocumented immigrants. “But that’s the point,” the bill’S supporters say.
